title: Wayne Brady: The Family Remix
overview: What happens when an entertainer so iconic peels back the curtain on the realities of an unexpected life? In Wayne Brady: The Family Remix, Brady has turned the term "modern family" on its head. He's still best friends with his ex-wife, soulmate, and business partner, Mandie Taketa. Together, they co-parent their 21-year-old daughter, Maile Brady, a student and aspiring artist, as well as running their production company, A Wayne & Mandie Creative ("Wayne Brady's Comedy IQ"). Jason Fordham, Mandie's life partner since 2009, handles the family's cinematography and post-production; and Mandie and Jason have an almost 3-year-old son, Sundance-Isamu.Â
